To say that teenage girl Alex Russo had many secrets in her life was an understatement however she had one secret that she guarded even more then her wizard powers a secret she trusted to only her closest friends and family Alex Russo was Incontinence this meant that she had a very weak bladder and had so since birth having a small bladder also meant that Alex could accidently pee herself with even a strong sneeze. When Alex was five she was wetting the bed nightly and sometimes during the day her parents of course did every trick in the book to stop but eventually her pediatrician told them of her medical condition. Now the Russo’s did make money in their sub shop but only so much so it seemed much less costly to live with the problem rather than correct it. Alex eventually learned to do just that she always left for a restroom the moment she felt the need and was eventually taken out of diapers. In her teen years Alex still wet the bed but rarely. However there was one time when Alex’s problem became much apparent it all started with cleaning out the basement for an art studio but her parents told her she could not have the basement. However at the time Alex’s best friend wanted a place to stay in New York because her parents were moving so the Russo family let Alex set up a bedroom in the Alex’s would be art studio while helping her friend set up her bedroom the two came across something from their childhood an old doll house. This was when Alex got the idea to use her magical powers to shrink her art supplies and use the doll house as an art studio.

Later on Alex shrunk herself to work in her new studio that was when disaster struck because Alex’s parents came down stairs.

“Oh look its Alex’s old doll house some many memories” said Alex’s mother Theresa nostalgically before adding “we can get rid of that too” she said grabbing the doll house.
It was a big shock for Alex when the entire doll house began to shake she immediately tried to grow herself back but in dropped her wand outside of the doll house door right before it shut “oh no” said Alex.
It was not long before Alex’s parents were outside of their substation where they ran in to Olive the little girl whose father ran a produce stand on Waverly Place following a little chit chat Olive’s attention fell on the doll house. “That’s a really pretty doll house Mrs. Russo is it yours?” she asked.
“Mine?” asked Theresa with a giggle “Oh no honey it’s Alex’s she’s too old now so were going to get rid of it” she told Olive in the distance Alex thought she heard something drop.
“Really may I have it?” asked Olive.
“Well of course and you know what it comes with a carrying strap here you go” said Teresa handing Olive the doll house, her husband’s old sweet band, and although she didn’t know It her shrunken doll sized daughter.
“Thank you so much” said Olive.

Just then Alex heard Harpers panicked voice “Oh you can’t have it it’s Alex’s” said Harper taking the doll house she then pointed at the band “but that’s all yours” she added.
“Harper I know you and Alex loved playing with this when you were little but don’t you want someone else to enjoy it now?” asked Alex’s father Jerry.
“No” said Harper.
“Harper we already gave it to Olive” argued Teresa’s.
“Ok but can I look inside it you know for sentimental reasons?” asked Harper as she looked in through a window.

“Harper!” said Alex in distress “I dropped my wand and it rolled out the door when we were in the basement I’m in so much trouble” she said.

“I’ll go get Justin” said Harper.
“Get Justin why?” asked Teresa.
Harper thought for a moment “because he loved this doll house too” she said tearfully.

“Harper” Alex called Harper looked back into the window.

“Don’t go ask Justin for help I’m going to try to fix this myself now please go and try to find my wand it’s somewhere in the basement hurry” said Alex urgently “and remind me to always go to the bathroom before I come in here” she added crossing her legs her health problem beginning to get the better of her and with that Harper was off to search the basement. I t was at this moment that Alex realized a major drawback in her plan while Harper searched she was at the mercy of Olive who at that moment was picking up the doll house and taking it to some nearby steps.

Alex felt the shaking of the house and looked out and realized that Olive was skipping with happiness “Oh I think I’m going to be sick” said Alex as the doll house stopped shaking. The breath of relief Alex let out however was short lived because soon the doll house began to open and Alex looked out to see Olive’s giant face looking in the doll house.

“It’s so pretty” said Olive as she looked through the rooms it was then that her eyes fell on Alex “oh neat they left a doll in here” Olive continued as she reached in. At the sight of Olive’s giant hand coming closer to her Alex felt urine begin leak out but she remained still as Olive wrapped her fingers around her. “Doesn’t feel like plastic” said Olive to herself but she ignored the thought that was when she felt the wetness of the jeans the doll was wearing. “Neat a wetting doll” said Olive excitedly “since you look so much like my neighbor Alex and this is her old doll house that’s what I’ll name you” Alex told her new toy and with that she jumped into a game of pretend.

Olive began by dragging Alex across the pavement then she spoke in a high voice “Uh oh I wet myself” said Olive through Alex. Olive then spoke in her normal voice “oh Alex did you wet your pants like a naughty baby?” she asked. “Yes I did Olive” said Olive through Alex. “Well if you act like a baby I’m going to treat you like one” said Olive as she stripped Alex of her clothes and wrapped a napkin around her legs like a diaper and dressed her in a ridicules dress and added pigtails with ribbons to her hair “now lets go home” said Olive as she put Alex back in the doll house and skipped home.

Modern Witchcraft


Magical Manipulation

Many witches do not believe in spirits, and most if not all reject belief in a literal Devil or demons. Naturally, therefore, they reject the idea that sorcery and divination are accomplished by the agency of evil spirits. Many offer naturalistic explanations for the working of magic and divination and other "psychic technologies." On the whole, the occult community today has expanded its definition of "the natural" to incorporate elements that were earlier considered supernatural, placing them in the category of the super- or paranormal instead. Yet, they are still involved in the "old ways" -- that is, the occult.

Now You See it, Now You Don't

What has happened in the occult world in the past two or more decades is just what C. S. Lewis described in his classic work, The Screwtape Letters -- which portrays an experienced demon (Screwtape) writing letters of advice to a novice demon (Wormwood):

I have great hopes that we shall learn in due time how to emotionalize and mythologize their science to such an extent that what is, in effect, a belief in us, (though not under that name) will creep in while the human mind remains closed to belief in the Enemy [i.e., God]. The "Life Force," the worship of sex, and some aspects of Psychoanalysis, may here prove useful. If once we can produce our perfect work -- the Materialist Magician, the man, not using, but veritably worshipping, what he vaguely calls "Forces" while denying the existence of "spirits" -- then the end of the war will be in sight.

Lewis's insights on the insidious strategy of Satan -- the archenemy of our souls -- appear to have been right on target in regard to modern occultism.

1232.content:
"Gigi!"

Once again, Alex had been humiliated in front of the entire school by the bane of her existence: Gigi Hollingsworth. Spilling juice on her pants at school today was the last in a long line of cruel pranks: Placing seran wrap over the toilet seats, putting a thumb tack on Alex's chair right before she sat on it, and the worst one of them all, pouring a small amount of castor oil into her Coke. She shuddered at the memory.

Well, she had had enough. Yeah, she used to enjoy the back-and-forth nature of their rivalry, but Gigi was getting way too cruel, and taking things way too seriously. It was time to take drastic action, to strike so hard that Gigi would never recover from the psychological scars. And she was going to recruit magic to do it.

It was twelve minutes after midnight, but of course Alex was still awake. She usually chose to sleep in the afternoons (and during Science class, which might explain the 14 missing assignments), because it was much easier to do... illicit activities when there weren't other people snooping around, trying to get all in her business. There were no lights on in the lair, save for a single black candle, lit with an indigo flame.

For you see, Madame Darkheart's Big Book of Hexes and Such could only be read, could only be comprehended in the darkness of midnight, illuminated solely by an enchanted black candle. She had payed a handsome sum to get her hands on this treasure trove of revenge, and it was worth every cent. Settling on a spell, she couldn't help but grin from ear to ear.

Getting to work, she drew a chalk symbol on the floor, a strange sort of figurine. Placing the candle in the center of the symbol, she picked up one of the many ceremonial daggers her father had laying around in the lair. It was inscribed in some ancient language that was probably incomprehensible to the human mind, and decorated with three rubies on the hilt. Kneeling before the flame, she made a quick slashing motion on her arm, not giving herself time to chicken out. A small gasp escaped her lips, and a few drops of blood fell onto the flame. Rather than extinguish it, the blood caused the fire to turn bright red. She quickly recited the spell:

"Demons, demons, in the night,
See my fire, blood and bright
As the blood made flame turn red
I wish to see my rival bled"

And with a high-pitched farting noise and a poof of smoke, the spell was completed. Before her stood a scrawny demon, with stubby horns and splotchy skin. Alex jumped up, and with a sinking feeling realized that the demon was only as high as her waist. She didn't know a whole lot about the dark arts, but she did know that the powerful demons were big.

"Hello, pathetic human! My name is Scorden, and I'll be your liaison to the underworld tonight. How may I help you?"

"Um, hello. I'd like to drive my enemy to the brink of insanity through humiliation, please."

"Ooh, sorry kid. You obviously meant to summon a much more powerful demon. I'm not authorized to drive people insane. Hey, pay more attention to the amount of blood you draw next time, right?"

Alex groaned. Maybe she should get Justin to help her summon a better demon. No, there's no way he'd help her do that. Alright, she'd make do with what she had.

"Alright, alright, well what can you do? Maim my enemy?"

"'Fraid not, kid."

"Torture her?"

"Sorry."

"Can you at least give her food poisoning or something?"

"Actually, yes! As a matter of fact, I'm training to become Chief Demon of Stomach Problems. I can give her a really bad case of diarrhea, and I can make it last a long time, like a week!"

"Got anything better?"

"No. Take it or leave it, kid."

123231.content:
"Why do I have to do this again?" Harper whined, following Alex into her bedroom "You know I hate skipping school!"

"Because, Harper..." Alex explained with forced patience "The body switching spell goes both ways. While I'm in Gigi's body, she'll be in mine, and the last thing I want is for her to jump out a window or something and leave me stuck in her body for the rest of my life. Just the thought makes me gag."

She rummaged through a pile of assorted novelty items hidden in the trunk at the foot of her bed, first pulling out a set of fuzzy handcuffs, and, after a minute of continued rummaging, pulling out a thick leather blindfold.

"Now, Harper, I'm going to put these on and sit in the closet, then I'm going to cast the body switching spell, okay? Right after I do, stuff a sock or something in my mouth. You know Gigi, she can't stop talking for even one minute... and then shut the door, in case Justin or somebody walks in."

"Alright Alex, I'll do it, but what's the point of all this?"

"Oh, you'll learn soon enough Harper. Possibly on the 6 o'clock news, if things go well."

************

Alex let her eyes open, slowly. The only time she had worn this much bad makeup was back when she actually bothered dressing up for Halloween, and the roar of the cafeteria was giving her a serious migraine. Still, at least the spell had worked.

As she slowly became aware of her surroundings, she noticed the distinct burn of people staring at her. Looking around, she saw that it was Gigi's two idiots, staring at her like cult members might stare at their fallen leader. One of them cleared her throat.

"Ah, what was that, Gigi?"

"Hmm? Oh... nothing. Forget about it."

The other one piped up. "Are you okay, Gigi? You kind of just, dropped your head down for a second. How do you feel?"

"Me? I feel fine. A little sleepy, maybe. You know, actually, I should probably go to the Nurse's office."

************

Alex glanced around cautiously, making sure there was no one around to stop her. Balancing on a chair, she flicked open her Zippo lighter (which she had stored in her locker, just for such occasions), lit it up, and held it to one of the emergency sprinklers mounted on the ceiling. After several seconds of tense waiting, the wail of the fire alarm pierced the air, and she was drenched in water from the sprinkler.

She stepped down from the chair and walked into the panicked mass of students making way for the exits. Mr. Laritate and some teachers were trying to corral the herd, with limited success. Alex sat down on the stairs and picked a piece of lint of Gigi's blouse. It was only a matter of time until they checked the security cameras and tied the crime back to her. Perfect.

************

"Unbelievable! In all my years as an educator, never have I seen such blatant disregard for the safety of others!"

Gigi was confused, to say the least. First she blacks out, then she dreams she's in some dark room and can't move her arms. Then, she wakes up in Mr. Laritate's office, being accused of setting off the fire alarm. Confused was too soft of a word.

"Did you think this was funny? You must have, obviously. I might have expected this from Alex Russo, but not you, Ms. Hollingsworth."

"Mr. Laritate," Gigi started "I don't know what's going on here, but I do know that I did not set off the fire alarm. Look, can't you just let me off with a warning, or make me hug a poor person or something, and put this behind us?"

She could see a vein bulging in Mr. Laritate's forehead. She had never seen him this angry.

"No. Soft punishments are the reason you thought it okay to do this. I need a punishment that fits the crime."

He reached down into his desk and pulled out a sub sandwich, followed by a bottle of Miralax. Popping off the cap, he poured white powder inside the sandwich.

"Here. Eat this."

"What?"

"Eat this, and we'll forget all about this. If you won't, I'm afraid I have no choice but to expel you from Tribeca Prep."

"Expel?! But, I've already been expelled from three other schools! My parents said that if it happens again, they're sending me to military school!"

"Well, either you're having this laxative sandwich for lunch, or you're expelled. Your choice."

Gigi stared at the sandwich, tears beginning to well up in her eyes.

Which does she choose?
